title: Can't change forum picture
body:
My forum picture seems to be permanently stuck as the draven icon, which I personally hate. It was funny to use in game on Draven day (which was like 4 months ago), but I'm unable to switch it back to the one I usually use. Switching it in-client has no effect, and waiting for a fix doesn't seem to be working.

How can I change my forum picture?

replies.body: How often do the syncs happen?

You could always get F.E.K
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/3V6I7JvK-forum-enhancer-kit-fek-40

With that you can insert your own boards icon by following the link above and installing F.E.K

It may take a bit for your account to sync with the boards.  Your account has been booped to sync up, but I couldn't give an eta on how long that may take.  Hopefully, your icon will be updated quickly!
Yeah, that's the same response I got 4 months ago when I asked this question, although my account wasn't "booped up" then, so hopefully it works this time.
